message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. It's a great product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me at $8,000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $8,000 is a good price, it's a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $9,000 to make this deal work. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested in closing this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider meeting me at that price?
